scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../../.env ts-node -r dotenv/config --transpile-only src/main.ts
scripts.dev:server: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=../../.env nodemon src/main.ts --exec "ts-node --files -r dotenv/config" --config .nodemonrc --watch ../
